overview: As he picks up his old life as a dealer, Dag consumes his drugs in the attempt of forgetting his ex - girlfriend, Emilie. One day, he is hooked up with a potential new customer in Nora, a girl who use drugs to discover the ultimate spiritual experiences in life. As the two of them connect, Dag sees an opportunity to rediscover what he had with Emilie, in Nora.
title: Emilie
